body.p: The operator accounts for the construction services in accordance with IFRS 15. It measures revenue at the fair value of the non‑cash consideration received or receivable. Thus in each of years 1 and 2 it recognises in its profit or loss construction costs of CU500, construction revenue of CU525 and, hence, construction profit of CU25.
